data.title: The Man Who Folded Himself — San Antonio Public Library
data.meta_description: The Man Who Folded Himself — Gerrold, David, 1944- — With an introduction by Robert J. Sawyer. The Man Who Folded Himself is a classic science fiction novel by award-winning author David Gerrold. This work was nominated for both Hugo and Nebula awards and is considered by some critics to be the finest time travel novel ever written.
data.text: With an introduction by Robert J. Sawyer. The Man Who Folded Himself is a classic science fiction novel by award-winning author David Gerrold. This work was nominated for both Hugo and Nebula awards and is considered by some critics to be the finest time travel novel ever written.
